body_html: OK, it looks like it's a problem in the TFRecordReader. I glanced at the code of the reader itself and it seems fine. Would you mind putting a few LOG(INFO) statements to see if the lock reset code gets called, and if not, why?

body: OK, it looks like it's a problem in the TFRecordReader. I glanced at the code of the reader itself and it seems fine. Would you mind putting a few `LOG(INFO)` statements to see if the lock reset code gets called, and if not, why?
